trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_SEQ_00<tab>Buqatai has his eye on some well-guarded bones.
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the beast bones to Buqatai.
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_000<tab>Would you happen to be headed in the direction of that mountain to the west?
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_001<tab>There are some bones up there that I need to collect, but I cannot get past all the muu shuwuu that nest in the area.
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_002<tab>I mean them no harm, yet they think I am trying to steal their eggs. I barely escaped with my life the last time.
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_003<tab>If you are up to the task, I would have you collect four bones for me. I worry that if I try to go there again I will not be as lucky as I was previously.
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_004<tab>Go to the mountain to the west and collect four bones for me.
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_010<tab>Glad to see you remain uneaten! Did you get your hands on the bones?
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_011<tab>Ah yes, this thicker one belonged to a steppe dzo. And this one is the ankle bone of a gulo gulo. Oh my, a baras bone!
TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_012<tab>Thank you, adventurer. I shall turn these into dice so that I may perform divinations.

TEXT_STMBDZ514_02765_BUQATAI_000_013<tab>I am so busy with my work that I do not have the time to visit the udgan. It may be primitive, but using dice allows me to continue to consult with the elder gods.
